verbose_text: We previously showed that TCR / CD28 induced activation of MAPKs, NF-kappaB, and NF-AT is comparable between WT and Cblb -/- T cells, suggesting that the potentiation of Th2 and Th9 cell differentiation in the absence of Cbl-b may be due to augmented expression of IL-4R or aberrant activation of IL-4R signaling.
